brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts two editing techniques: Delete/Change and Insert. The commands used in these techniques are listed below:

Delete/Change
R1 (config) # IP access-list extended SERVER-ACCESS
R1 (config-ext-n ACL)# no 20
R1 (config-ext-n ACL) # 20 permit IP host 192.168.1.77 any
R1 (config-ext-n ACL) #end
R1 # show access-lists
Extended IP access list SERVER-ACCESS
10 permit IP host 192.168.1.66 host 192.168.3.75
20 permit IP host 192.168.1.77 any
30 deny IP 192.168.1.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.3.75

Insert
R1 (config) # IP access-list extended SERVER-ACCESS
R1 (config-ext-n ACL) # 25 deny IP host 192.168.1.88 any
R1 (config-ext-n ACL) # end
R1 # show access-lists
Extended IP access-list SERVER-ACCESS
10 permit IP host 192.168.1.66 host 192.168.3.75
20 permit IP host 192.168.1.77 any
25 deny IP host 192.168.1.88 any
30 deny IP 192.168.1.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.3.75
